wikipedia_page.main: Kenneth Kershaw Booth (22 November 1934 – 7 November 2015) was an English footballer who played as an inside forward. He played over 100 matches in the Football League for several clubs.

response: Ken Booth FBA (born 29 January 1943)  is a British international relations theorist, and the former E H Carr Professor of the Department of International Politics at Aberystwyth University.Aberystwyth University Department of International Politics
He is an elected Academician of the Society of Learned Societies for the Social Sciences. He was elected to the British Academy in 2006.British Academy Fellow: Professor Ken Booth
* Ken Booth (academic) (born 1943), British international relations theorist
* Ken Booth (politician) (1926–1988), New South Wales politician
